messages.content:

have access to resource re hi part copied has advised he resource ask everyone has blocker work thank december pm hi ask add resource policy package name machine obi obi port document attached thank december pm december pm acre re december re user december re si obi face december re si december ne la va ii legate obi logo central color con care pot partial strict si pot ale care va la contains proprietary information which legally privileged unauthorized dissemination prohibited intended recipient views addressing transmission error has misdirected please notify author by replying intended recipient must disclose distribute copy print rely
